properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 30 at 3:06AM EST until January 30 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
